## Objective

For given list of taxa, return a table with:

- taxon identification columns ...
- time_start_min
- time_start_max
- time_end_min
- time_end_max
- longitude_min, longitude_max
- lattitude_min, latitude_max

## Setup

```{julia}
using DataFrames
using PaleobiologyDB
```

## Data discovery and assembly


### Initial data collection

```{julia}
carnivora_occs = pbdb_occurrences(;
    base_name = "Carnivora",
    show = "full",
    vocab = "pbdb",
    extids = true,
)
```
